title: The Candy House
description: A daring and inventive novel exploring memory, identity, and technology in a connected world.
author: Jennifer Egan

title: Hard-Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
description: A mind-bending novel blending cyberpunk science fiction with surreal fantasy, exploring consciousness, identity, and parallel worlds.
author: Haruki Murakami

title: Neuromancer
description: A cyberpunk classic about a washed-up hacker hired for one last job.
author: William Gibson

title: Educated
description: A memoir about a woman who escapes a survivalist family to earn a PhD from Cambridge.
author: Tara Westover
